daily_fact: Bubby’s in Tribeca recently celebrated an all-time record for its iconic pancakes, showcasing the restaurant's enduring popularity and the community's love for local dining experiences.
topline_md: Recent updates in New York include severe storm damage across the Tri-State area, rising flu hospitalizations, and new laws enhancing protections for sexual assault survivors and homeowners. Additionally, NYC's holiday travel is expected to be impacted by potential snow, while public safety concerns arise ahead of New Year's Eve celebrations.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Tri-State storm damage: Heavy rain and strong winds cause downed trees and power lines across Manhattan and Long Island. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Out-of-control Bronx bus had a history of brake problems and was cleared just 7 hours before the crash. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMixgFBVV95cUxPemExYlY1eUFiSU05Wi1kY0Fsb2o1enJIcmc1VF9USE5UNzZSUHNTTzdIYmMwZDAxcWdhUkdydV9GUkRvaG5QdUxuQ0QyaW53QkdQYW43Z2N1b3JoTlFyT1NsM3RaM05lbU1RYkVBeHZGWEN6NGdEOEpYV3lwUWNLUkRRcWxfcVMxWGVNa21ZanRNb3J1UXNFTWFGdGlZMVFOR2l4YnBTdU42UFJJajRxUzhvRDc0eFlZVVd6ampJdjdOVlRXeGc?oc=5)
- NYC health department warns of a surge in flu cases as hospitalizations rise significantly. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Security report identifies lone wolves and small groups as persistent threats for New Year's Eve in Times Square. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiygFBVV95cUxNdkpQbEJRbmhSelZrMjd5bjVPUXRFS05JOGNPUGlIR3NCeWEzTTBYZG1veENjZW1RazhLbUdadGNlMjdXTThpc0NFNWF1Mm5UNk44dVhWMENsUTY5amFQdmlhaWFaR05YMXplZFN4M2I1T0lQa2Z5WmQ4WGNybHIyTUVwUzFVT0JmQkZ6ZDU0VlMxYWlJSGw1VHZPWWRpYVJaNXg3by02LWlYdUE3WEl5QmxDOGI2anRIMGFoa2ZKOW0wcFFjOXpxUUdn?oc=5)
- Holiday travel is busy at airports and on roads; snow expected Tuesday may cause delays. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC trash and recycling collection suspended; check for updates on resumption. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Water issues linked to the latest fire at the Warwick battery storage facility raise ongoing safety concerns. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxPMU9NWDhYMGNRWVd5MGZwcXhRTGh2TnN4Z3FWdWR4d1YwcWljQTB2WlNJR3h0YXlKOWpUV08xb3lTUWlkSGpTT1lxYV93MWhYZ0tLTmlVbmdTeENvbE1zY25KRndiSUdURUQ5YzV1Y3VEQVYwQ2k4RXF4RVdIWE80Nk1MRjFueXNhaEMwSU9NNnRvaW9rOVZzY256djFpYTgzVE9DdzBHajFLUQ?oc=5)

civics_politics.title: Civics & Politics
civics_politics.summary_md:
### Civics & Politics

- New York enacts major prison reforms; significant changes include reduced sentences and improved rehabilitation programs. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- New York law grants homeowners access to neighbors’ property for repairs, including compensation for damages. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Hochul vetoes bill mandating two-person crews on NYC subways, citing budget constraints. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMihAFBVV95cUxOVVA3anJva0ZHUXA3T2FlVGFVWXd1dTVwRm9FNU5rdWFldnVPZU9GZ1JMU21uY0huMWN4bEhiXzJRMUN3T1pQRVlZNjZKUmY3YWIyQWhzWHl3aEx6eU1aZFBpa3RMQnBERFBTdzVQVGlxQkdPemdrWFNBdU9CaGdXNU5jYVk?oc=5)
